Sequence Information.Target Organism: [Ref.29075946] Gram-positive bacteria:Bacillus subtilis (MIC=0.8μM), Staphylococcus aureus (MIC=0.8μM), Staphylococcus epidermidis (MIC=37.5μM);Gram-negative bacteria:Escherichia coli (MIC=50μM), Shigella dysenteriae (MIC=100μM), Klebsiella pneumoniae (MIC=37.5μM)
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: [Ref.29075946] 16.3% hemolysis at 12.5μM, 37.8% hemolysis at 25μM against human red cells
Sequence Information.Cytotoxicity: No cytotoxicity information found in the reference(s) presented
Sequence Information.Function: Antibacterial activity against the Gram-negative and Gram-positive bacteria, position 6 and 10 are cross-linked residues connected by the oct-4-enyl hydrocarbon staple

Literature.Title: Antimicrobial activity and stability of stapled helices of polybia-MP1
Literature.Author: Luong HX, Kim DH, Lee BJ, Kim YW
